properties.Name: Silver Lake
properties.Description: Swim in the summer and snowshoe across in the winter

properties.Name: Bristol Falls
properties.Description: Great swimming hole with places to jump off rocks and climb behind a waterfall

properties.Name: Whirlie's World
properties.Description: Great place to play laser tag with a few friends.

properties.Name: Community Supper at the Congregational Church
properties.Description: A wonderful place to volunteer and eat dinner on Friday afternoons.  If you want to actually organize a dinner yourself (for 200-300 people!), you can get money from your Commons, the Service Cluster Board, and many other organizations on campus.

properties.Name: Trader Joe's
properties.Description: Right near the airport, with a great wine selection, plenty of healthy frozen food options, and fantastic fresh produce.

properties.Name: Whirlie's World
properties.Description: Great place to play laser tag with a few friends.

properties.Name: Flynn Theater
properties.Description: Some great concerts come through this awesome old theater every year--definitely worth checking it out!

properties.Name: Higher Ground
properties.Description: Wonderful atmosphere and fairly inexpensive music in Burlington.

properties.Name: Shelburne Market
properties.Description: Wonderful local supermarket in Shelburne.  You can get a huge variety of yogurt, sliced deli meats, excellent baking chocolate, among other fresh food items.
